comment: . "Misleading press reports" -- mon dieu! Shocked, shocked that such a thing occurs. A foundation of belief shakes.
amr:
# ::snt . "Misleading press reports" -- mon dieu! Shocked, shocked that such a thing occurs. A foundation of belief shakes.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (r / report-01
            :ARG0 (p / press)
            :ARG0-of (m2 / mislead-01))
      :snt2 (m3 / mon-dieu
            :mode expressive)
      :snt3 (a / and
            :op1 (s / shock-01
                  :ARG0 (e / event
                        :mod (s2 / such))
                  :ARG1 (ii / i))
            :op2 (s3 / shake-01
                  :ARG1 (f / foundation
                        :mod (b / believe-01)))))

comment: C'est la France! C'est le temps de montrer la porte a ceux qui veulent changer votre mode de vie.
amr:

            :ARG1 (c2 / country
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "France")))
      :snt2 (h / have-concession-91
            :ARG1 (h2 / have-polarity-91
                  :ARG1 (t / temps
                        :mod (m2 / montrer-00

                  :ARG2 -)
            :ARG2 -
            :ARG1-of (c3 / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (p2 / person
                        :mod (c4 / certain)

                              :ARG1 (m3 / mode
                                    :mod (v / vie)))))))
